documents.document: Came home to our @glyndebourne tickets. And now, food planning begins...
Head tried to explode again, this time during the organ concert. I wish it wouldn't keep happening. #scanners
Can't say I'd recommend the Pinot Noir here. Definite need for Cadbury Buttons.
Phone battery life is shite now, but if I change my phone, I'll have to start #nekoatsume all over again! ðŸ˜± #ã­ã“ã‚ã¤ã‚

Organ concert at RFH later. ðŸ™Œ
Hi @EnglandRugby - do doors open at about 2pm at Twickenham tomorrow? I was hoping to see Scotland v Ireland on the TVs in stadium. Thanks.
@Edward_George_ @Schnuckms It was well adapted all round, we felt. A pity we probably won't get to see it again before it closes.
@Rex_Oper Although he did want it triggering the day after the vote, originally. God, he's such a twat.
'And the wicked evil kookaburra is driven away, and then all the ickle goblins live happily ever after. The end'. ðŸ“– https://t.co/j5PlELd7Dz

The cunts at @SkySportsNewsHQ at it again I see. https://t.co/8FhzoYqK44
@leonora1 @wigmore_hall Sorry to miss you, you'd already left your seats and so I nipped to toilet and back.
Lucky to get through tonight. My head tried to explode on me midway through first half. Holding back simultaneous cough and sneeze is hard.
Look at this, @Schnuckms! Copyright infringement! ðŸ˜® https://t.co/j7BDBflcrC
'Buy the Big Issue and help get my dog out of Battersea'. Heard everything now. Maybe his dog likes being at home? ðŸ˜•
Such a glorious @LizWattsSoprano Schubert recital at @wigmore_hall. Gorgeous voice, and an expressive range that never ceases to amaze me.

@leonora1 Yes - at my seat already! @wigmore_hall
Love @ASKItalian Wigmore Street. Sarah and team always look after me perfectly. Good to see company looks after itsâ€¦ https://t.co/60gImnCg4l
Fuck me, the salsa on that starter was hot. Should've got a carafe of the Primitivo.
@clogsilk A future career in the EU cruelly torn away! ðŸ˜€
@AodhBC Who amongst us didn't start a fascist organisation in our younger days, after all?
It's like the Poll Tax trial all over again. https://t.co/X8WHN9TpLu
Solo Wiggy trip in the end. Having @ASKItalian beforehand.
Bit of a bargain here in HMV Oxford Street. Think I've nabbed the last one too... https://t.co/FHZEArqk8Z
Utterly surrounded by thick fucks today. Mankind's stupidity exhausts me.
Tommy Mair. https://t.co/HfGp5svcSY
Currently blocking accounts that keep following, unfollowing and refollowing every couple of days.
Can't concentrate on my book because I'm sitting opposite a man in his 20s using an empty water bottle as a self-pacifier. ðŸ‘¶

Name the school, ðŸ”” ðŸ”š https://t.co/QXkPGI937a
@frankly_lfc Kasper will be twiddling his thumbs soon...
The conference call hold music is a 30 second loop of staggering banality, and yet still far preferable to anything Arvo PÃ¤rt ever wrote.
Not yet found anything to help me avoid torture, but there are some leaflets which will be useful preparation reading for my new job.
Today's meeting is in a building with flickering lights and loud, gurgling pipes. Expecting the bloke from Saw on conference call shortly.
@Tonywauk Don't think I'm well read enough to understand the allusions if I'm honest, quite apart from his writing style.
First two pages, anyway... https://t.co/yLoLD8XvNh
Actually quite a test post-illness, as I'm in work early today, out all day tomorrow day and evening, and all day and evening Saturday. ðŸ˜“
Glad to say that @Schnuckms and I shall be at @wigmore_hall for @LizWattsSoprano Schubert recital later. Begone, foul virus! Away, sniffles!
@Schnuckms And the Korea games and first Hong Kong will probably be too early for us UK time. ðŸ˜ž
@AlexaCoghlan Just bad English, surely? It doesn't make sense. Its root is horseriding, isn't it?
That game was dull as ditchwater, by the way. Most tedious 90 minutes since, well, since Written on Skin last week. ðŸ˜´
Yvette Cooper quizzing Amber Rudd on, with sound down. Facial expressions alone making it look like vil bastarda scene in Maria Stuarda.
Bit surprised City didn't sell the allocation out. https://t.co/17SCxnbWFK
Bought a Bluray recorder last week. Might test it out later by attempting to record #hospital whilst I watch #STOEVE.
Wouldn't be the first time he went nose first into white powder, I suppose. ðŸ˜ https://t.co/cthoFclgSr
@gsoh31 Do you know approximately when they vote?
@aquilanebula I have annual leave coming up, so maybe then...
Ah yes. Another Apple tragic with some wretched eWanker payment app that doesn't work. Wonderful.
@aquilanebula UCL Medical School, Royal Free site. Here for a seminar.
@_ShyamBhatt @RoyalOperaHouse It's a magical find. The kind of thing I'd collect if my flat wasn't already chocka!
I've worked in the NHS for many years, and even now I still don't know why Datix is more usually pronounced Datex.
@_ShyamBhatt @RoyalOperaHouse Travis and Emery?
@ZwischenKath The question is, where are they going that takes precedence?!
@_ShyamBhatt Is Yerma coming back to @youngvictheatre with Billie Piper? We missed it first time around.

Password now up in #nekoatsume but doesn't work in English, so had to get @Schnuckms to do it in Japanese. #ã­ã“ã‚ã¤ã‚
Sunderland fans entering new territory here. Otherwise known as the second half. ðŸ˜€
@iamths1973 @Schnuckms No idea what Mignolet was doing. ðŸ˜‚
@jflatter I half wondered whether you decided to go tonight when I saw the score.
@alex07fcb Quite the collector's item. I'm listening to it, sounded like a bizarre free kick routine.
Have we signed anyone yet, or is it going to be another dreary #DeadlineDay?
Chinese food delivery ordered. No energy in the house to cook tonight. Just hoping eating isn't beyond us.
Dildos do seem to be eternally linked to #DeadlineDay now, don't they.
Amazed that I Married A Communist was #Pointless
Something to get his teeth into, I suppose. https://t.co/R1y2kTn04g
@brianhaines Yes, between them two. Didn't know there was a Sydenham there too.
Guessing Newcastle will be lowest here. #Pointless
Can't imagine anything more odd than a champagne reception before Das Rheingold. I avoid taking in any liquids for about 3 hours before it.
Some people would give an eye for the Wotan Package. https://t.co/EGHr94wsgC
Really don't know Bond films. I'd say the man who played Jaws if I knew his real name. #Pointless
Gove is a fucking worm. I know this isn't new or insightful, but there it is.
@boulezian You'll at least be relieved to know you've missed Kate Hoey.
Loving these Labour MPs vociferously damning the leaving of the EU whilst still voting for it. Remind me what that party is for, again?
Clive Efford MP, Labour, Eltham, 'agrees with everything' @KCQCMP said, but 'will still vote to trigger Article 50'. ðŸ˜µ

@Edward_George_ I think it's a real shame someone can't take my good Â£10 Uchida seats just because not enough are wâ€¦ https://t.co/Ru9tu7COH0
Philip Davies about to oppose a ten minute rule bill on prosecuting so-called 'honour' killings. Even Tim Loughton is shaking his head.
Couldn't arts venues take returns if that price band is sold out? Â£10 seats are a different market to Â£65. ROH still does this, I think?
@southbankcentre Thanks. It's still not sold out so they won't take them yet, but suggested I try again later.
Or maybe they're just pissed that I dissed their website yesterday, in which case the answer is to sort out the website.
Bit disappointed not to get a response from @southbankcentre to this. They do respond via here. Presumably this reqâ€¦ https://t.co/8g80FVF0iY
Always thought it odd that French for 'now' is 'maintenant'. Never sounds very now to me. Two too many syllables. https://t.co/chpBVBNoWP
@SecondNorn Ah, got there before me! ðŸ˜€

Speaking of Mr Donut, I see they've been fined heavily for a karoshi case. Manager died at 50. 112 hours overtime the month before he died.
@Rex_Oper And uses the name of a Japanese doughnut company as his handle! ðŸ˜µ
